description: Details of an UNI product specification. These details are used for Serviceability Responses.
title: uniProductSpecDetail

___objectType.description: The type of the object, uniProductSpecDetail.

$eref.description: A quantity to be used for specifying information rates.
$eref.title: informationRateQuantity

___units.description: The unit of measure for the quantity.

___amount.description: A quantity of something. Typically size, value, extent, or money.

___objectType.description: The type of the object, bandwidthProfile.

___portSpeed.description: The speed of the port (in bits/s).

___id.description: Unique identifier for the UNI Product Specification Detail.
